org.workflowsim.clustering
Class BasicClustering

java.lang.Object
  org.workflowsim.clustering.BasicClustering
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClusteringInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
BalancedClustering, BlockClustering, HorizontalClustering, VerticalClustering
public class BasicClustering
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusteringInterface

The default clustering does no clustering at all, just map a task to a job

Since:
WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
